roleset.name: make like new

example.name: very typical
example.text: The $3.18 billion bid, which had been rumored since last week, ``creates a better feeling that there's value in the market at current levels and renews prospects for a hot tape,'' says A.C. Moore, director of research at Argus Research Corp.
example.arg: The $3.18 billion bid, which had been rumored since last week,

roleset.note: No comparison. No Vncls. Updated by Julia, 10/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'renew' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
